system.description:
**Primary Energy:** Matching elemental energy (Earth/Air/Fire/Water) 6  
**Supporting Energy:** Space 1 (close range) / Time 3 (duration 10 minutes)  
**Range:** Close, 30 ft.  
**Duration:** 10 minutes  
**Total Cost:** 10 Energy  
**Action:** Complex weave (2 actions)  
**Weaving Roll:** Primary Potential + Primary Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery  
**Effect:** Summon an elemental matching your Primary Energy at close range. Elemental has HP = (Your Potential Ã— 6), deals 10 damage, uses your Mastery for attacks, and has special abilities based on type. You can command it as [Free] action. If concentration breaks, elemental acts independently.  
**Saving Throw:** None (summoning weave)  
**Success Scaling:** 0 = fails, 1 = 1 minute, 2 = full effect, 3 = 1 hour, 4 = 8 hours or 2 elementals

---

## T
